Articles.Content:
Hi All,

If someone can help me with this. I launched my first part of space station (small for now) with command pod of 2 and bellow attached crew pod for 4 kerbalnouts. Once I had it where I wanted it, i went eva and just used the ladder to go to the crew "lounge" but when kerbalnout entered it, I lost all the track of that kerbal and can't "use" it again, meaning it is there and can't get out. Any help?
Ah, a common issue for people. Put your mouse near the door and when it says, "Crew Door" or something else, click on it.
